meanings.definition: Four times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The quadrupled amount of candy made the children smile.
meanings.sent2: She bought a quadrupled number of balloons for the party.
meanings.sent3: The quadrupled servings of ice cream were a hit at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: His quadrupled energy level surprised his friends during the hike.
meanings.sent5: The quadrupled stars in the sky made the night magical.
